thread.title: Two people killed when car crashes into Auschwitz tour bus | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Two people killed when car crashes into Auschwitz tour bus | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelly Mclaughlin For Mailonline
title: Two people killed when car crashes into Auschwitz tour bus | Daily Mail Online
text: Two people killed when car crashes into Auschwitz tour bus carrying Britons in Poland The crash happened on Saturday on a motorway in Zagorz, in southern Poland Two people in a Citroen car were travelling on the motorway when the unidentified driver lost control and collided into the tour bus The driver and passenger of the car died in the crash, and one passenger of the coach, the 23-year-old tour guide, was seriously injured and taken to hospital The bus carrying 54 people had tourists from England, Italy and Germany aboard The coach was on the way back from a visit to Nazi death camp Auschwitz
